data.name: Make Your Fundraising Event Virtual: A Blueprint for Coronavirus and Beyond
data.summary:
What You’ll Learn:

Ways nonprofits have successfully pivoted to virtual fundraisers
Lessons learned to help you create and manage virtual events
Essentials you’ll need to live stream your virtual event
Online tools that encourage giving and engagement
data.speakers:
Lynn M. Juniel, Director of Development, Friends of Youth
Renee Shields, Development Associate & Special Projects, Advocates for Children
Sarah Baker, Digital Fundraising Strategist, MobileCause
